Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-37371 affecting package krb5 for versions less than 1.21.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-37371 affecting package krb5 for versions less than 1.21.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package krb5 is earlier than 1.21.3-1, affected by CVE-2024-37371
